classification.task_goal: Create a detailed list of species needed to establish a stable ecosystem for Anoles on a barren exoplanet, without introducing any vertebrates other than small fish and Anole species.
primary_constraints: List every single species needed to be introduced, without any vertebrates other than small fish and anole species.
Include all organisms, bacteria, fungi, plants, etc.
classification.reasoning: The AI initially provided a response that did not fully adhere to the user's constraints by suggesting the introduction of vertebrates (frogs or salamanders) before the user explicitly requested a list without any vertebrates. The user then clarified the constraints, prompting the AI to adjust its response accordingly, thus repairing the violation.
